briefdescription.para: Source widget for panning and zooming.
Zoom rectangle top-left in world coordinates.
Zoom margin in relative data space (percentage)
Boolean determining whether the user has navigated.
Prohibit zoom factor value change flag, used to prevent infinite loops when setting the zoom factor from the outside.
Initializes the two-dimensional navigator with a sourceWidget.

simplesect.para: True if the event was handled, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Set the world zoom rectangle to zoomRectangleWorld.
Get the zoom rectangle margin type.
Set the zoom rectangle margin type to zoomMarginType.

simplesect.para: Zoom rectangle margin in screen coordinates

briefdescription.para: Set the zoom margin in screen coordinates to zoomMarginScreen.

simplesect.para: Zoom rectangle margin in data coordinates

briefdescription.para: Set the zoom margin in data coordinates to zoomMarginData.
Set the zoom factor to zoomFactor.
Set the zoom percentage to zoomPercentage.
Get whether the navigator is enabled.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether the navigator is enabled

parameterdescription.para: Boolean determining whether the navigator is enabled

briefdescription.para: Get the source widget device pixel ratio.
Set the zoom center in world coordinates to zoomCenterWorld.

parameterdescription.para: Force reset event when the user has navigated

briefdescription.para: Get whether the renderer is panning.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether the renderer is panning

briefdescription.para: Get whether the renderer is zooming.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether the renderer is zooming

briefdescription.para: Get whether the renderer is navigating.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether the renderer is navigating

briefdescription.para: Get whether the user has navigated.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether the user has navigated

briefdescription.para: Get the zoom region rectangle in screen coordinates.

simplesect.para: Zoom region rectangle in screen coordinates

briefdescription.para: Set whether the renderer is panning to isPanning.

parameterdescription.para: Boolean determining whether the renderer is panning

briefdescription.para: Set whether the renderer is zooming to isZooming.

parameterdescription.para: Boolean determining whether the renderer is zooming

briefdescription.para: Set whether the renderer is navigating to isNavigating.

parameterdescription.para: Boolean determining whether the renderer is navigating

briefdescription.para: Begin changing the zoom rectangle in world coordinates.
End changing the zoom rectangle in world coordinates.
Signals that is panning changed to isPanning.
Signals that is zooming changed to isZooming.

parameterdescription.para: Boolean determining whether the renderer is zooming

briefdescription.para: Signals that is navigating changed to isNavigating.

parameterdescription.para: Boolean determining whether the renderer is navigating

briefdescription.para: Signals that enabled changed to enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Boolean determining whether the navigator is enabled

briefdescription.para: Signals that the zoom rectangle in world coordinates has changed from previousZoomRectangleWorld to currentZoomRectangleWorld.
Signals that the zoom center in world coordinates has changed from previousZoomCenterWorld to currentZoomCenterWorld.
Signals that the zoom factor has changed from previousZoomFactor to currentZoomFactor.
Signals that the zoom margin is about to chang.
Signals that the zoom margin has changed.

detaileddescription.para: Orchestrates panning and zooming in a widget that displays 2D data using Renderer2D
